summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $35.95 from Local Improvement District Fund No. 1213 to be paid Landes Estate Company as a refund of assessment paid in error against the west 50 feet of the south 41 feet of Lot 4, block 2, Brawley's Addition, for the improvement of Jackson Street under Ordinance No. 13309, and directing the City Treasurer to reinstate the assessment as unpaid against the property above described on the roll of said district.
